LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Archotech_VisualSen: An archotech device in the form of a visual sensor. Synstructs derive great benefit from these devices, but at a cost. Synstructs are manmade creations that are neither psychic nor organic in nature. It is not clear whether Archotechs despise them for being out of their grasp, or for some other esoteric reason. The displeasure of the unknowable beings manifests through even the simplest of their implants, steadily whittling away at the consciousness of synstructs.

The displeasure of the unknowable beings manifests through even the simplest of their implants, steadily whittling away at the consciousness of synstructs.

LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Archotech_Reactor.d: An archotech device in the form of a reactor - but it seems to reduce power consumption as well. Synstructs derive great benefit from these devices, but at a cost. Synstructs are manmade creations that are neither psychic nor organic in nature. It is not clear whether Archotechs despise them for being out of their grasp, or for some other esoteric reason. The displeasure of the unknowable beings manifests through even the simplest of their implants, steadily whittling away at the consciousness of synstructs.
